00041 /*********************************************************************/
00094 static void set_PinFunc ( uint8_t portnum, uint8_t pinnum, uint8_t funcnum)
00095 {
00096         uint32_t pinnum_t = pinnum;
00097         uint32_t pinselreg_idx = 2 * portnum;
00098         uint32_t *pPinCon = (uint32_t *)&LPC_PINCON->PINSEL0;
00099 
00100         if (pinnum_t >= 16) {
00101                 pinnum_t -= 16;
00102                 pinselreg_idx++;
00103         }
00104         *(uint32_t *)(pPinCon + pinselreg_idx) &= ~(0x03UL << (pinnum_t * 2));
00105         *(uint32_t *)(pPinCon + pinselreg_idx) |= ((uint32_t)funcnum) << (pinnum_t * 2);
00106 }
00107 
00108 /*********************************************************************/
00159 void set_ResistorMode ( uint8_t portnum, uint8_t pinnum, uint8_t modenum)
00160 {
00161         uint32_t pinnum_t = pinnum;
00162         uint32_t pinmodereg_idx = 2 * portnum;
00163         uint32_t *pPinCon = (uint32_t *)&LPC_PINCON->PINMODE0;
00164 
00165         if (pinnum_t >= 16) {
00166                 pinnum_t -= 16;
00167                 pinmodereg_idx++ ;
00168         }
00169 
00170         *(uint32_t *)(pPinCon + pinmodereg_idx) &= ~(0x03UL << (pinnum_t * 2));
00171         *(uint32_t *)(pPinCon + pinmodereg_idx) |= ((uint32_t)modenum) << (pinnum_t * 2);
00172 }
00173 
00174 /*********************************************************************/
00225 void set_OpenDrainMode( uint8_t portnum, uint8_t pinnum, uint8_t modenum)
00226 {
00227         uint32_t *pPinCon = (uint32_t *)&LPC_PINCON->PINMODE_OD0;
00228 
00229         if (modenum == PINSEL_PINMODE_OPENDRAIN){
00230                 *(uint32_t *)(pPinCon + portnum) |= (0x01UL << pinnum);
00231         } else {
00232                 *(uint32_t *)(pPinCon + portnum) &= ~(0x01UL << pinnum);
00233         }
00234 }

00242 /*********************************************************************/
00251 void PINSEL_ConfigTraceFunc(FunctionalState NewState)
00252 {
00253         if (NewState == ENABLE) {
00254                 LPC_PINCON->PINSEL10 |= (0x01UL << 3);
00255         } else if (NewState == DISABLE) {
00256                 LPC_PINCON->PINSEL10 &= ~(0x01UL << 3);
00257         }
00258 }

00260 /*********************************************************************/
00273 void PINSEL_SetI2C0Pins(uint8_t i2cPinMode, FunctionalState filterSlewRateEnable)
00274 {
00275         uint32_t regVal;
00276 
00277         if (i2cPinMode == PINSEL_I2C_Fast_Mode){
00278                 regVal = PINSEL_I2CPADCFG_SCLDRV0 | PINSEL_I2CPADCFG_SDADRV0;
00279         }
00280 
00281         if (filterSlewRateEnable == DISABLE){
00282                 regVal = PINSEL_I2CPADCFG_SCLI2C0 | PINSEL_I2CPADCFG_SDAI2C0;
00283         }
00284         LPC_PINCON->I2CPADCFG = regVal;
00285 }

00288 /*********************************************************************/
00296 void PINSEL_ConfigPin(PINSEL_CFG_Type *PinCfg)
00297 {
00298         set_PinFunc(PinCfg->Portnum, PinCfg->Pinnum, PinCfg->Funcnum);
00299         set_ResistorMode(PinCfg->Portnum, PinCfg->Pinnum, PinCfg->Pinmode);
00300         set_OpenDrainMode(PinCfg->Portnum, PinCfg->Pinnum, PinCfg->OpenDrain);
00301 }
